top_stories.title: Meta’s V-JEPA 2 model teaches AI to understand its surroundings
top_stories.description: Meta's V-JEPA 2 model is a "world model," referring to AI that is designed to understand its physical surroundings.
top_stories.author: Amanda Silberling

top_stories.title: Apple executives say new AI-powered Siri wasn’t ‘demoware,’ it just wasn’t ready to ship
top_stories.description: Apple's executives would not concede to being behind in the AI race.
top_stories.author: Sarah Perez

top_stories.title: Pinterest tests an AI feature that lets advertisers turn their catalogs into shoppable collages
top_stories.description: Pinterests is experimenting with "auto-collages," an AI feature that allows advertisers to quickly turn their product catalogs into shoppable collages.
top_stories.author: Aisha Malik

top_stories.title: The Browser Company launches its AI-first browser, Dia, in beta
top_stories.description: With its built-in AI interface, Dia hopes to give people an easy way to use AI, cutting out the need to visit tools like  ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Claude.
top_stories.author: Ivan Mehta

top_stories.title: Uptime Industries wants to boost localized AI usage with an ‘AI-in-a-box’ called Lemony AI
top_stories.description: The Lemony AI device can run large language models, AI agents and automated workflows locally.
top_stories.author: Rebecca Szkutak
